1.name: SIGNAL INJECTION
1.desc: Establish a carrier wave. Inject 5+ signal nodes and achieve correlation (r) > 0.90.
1.log_guide: Please inject signal nodes to form a carrier wave.

2.name: NOISE PURGE
2.desc: Eliminate interference. Remove anomalies (outliers) to restore signal integrity.
2.log_guide: Signal corruption detected. Please purge anomalies.

3.name: ARCHIVE LOCK
3.desc: Achieve full synchronization. Maintain stability > 0.99 with 10+ nodes.
3.log_guide: Stabilize the signal. Increase node density (10+) and coherence.

concepts.title: 01. BASIC CONCEPTS
concepts.correlation_body: A measure of the relationship between two variables. If 'Temperature' rises and 'Ice Cream Sales' rise, this is a **Positive Correlation**. If 'Rain' increases and 'Customers' decrease, this is a **Negative Correlation**.
concepts.importance_body: In the real world (outside the simulation), it is essential for prediction. Stock prices, disease progression, cosmic expansion. All are controllable by finding patterns in data correlations to predict the next 'frame'.

theory.title: 02. THEORY
theory.r_desc: The correlation coefficient *r* ranges from -1 to +1. Closer to +1 means strong positive correlation, -1 means strong negative correlation, and 0 means no correlation.

apps.title: 04. APPLICATIONS
apps.finance_body: Used in Portfolio Theory to analyze asset correlations and diversify risk. combining negatively correlated assets reduces damage during crashes.
apps.ai_body: Used in Feature Selection to pick data strongly correlated with target variables. Removing irrelevant noise improves model accuracy.
apps.spurious_body: There is a strong correlation between 'Ice Cream Sales' and 'Drowning Accidents', but no causation (the common factor is 'Temperature'). An Operator must never confuse correlation with causation.

completion.msg: Signal integrity restored. The Archive acknowledges your contribution.

1.name: FLUX DETECTOR
1.desc: Capture the world's movement. Manipulate parameter (t) and observe Slope > 1.0.
1.log_guide: System is static. Exceed critical velocity.

2.name: ZERO POINT
2.desc: Identify the moment change stops. Locate Slope ≈ 0.
2.log_guide: Searching for equilibrium. Locate the extremum.

3.name: INTEGRAL FIELD
3.log_guide: Accumulate energy. Maximize the area under the curve.

4.name: REALITY HACK
4.desc: Gradient descent, physics, economics. Apply this power outside the simulation.

concepts.title: 01. CORE CONCEPTS
concepts.diff_body: The world is not static. How is it changing 'right now'? That is differentiation. A speedometer displays the derivative of position in real-time.
concepts.int_body: The 'accumulation' of the past. Adding up infinite slices to find total distance, volume, or energy. A CT scan reconstructs a 3D object by integrating slices.

theory.title: 02. THEORETICAL FRAMEWORK
theory.derivative_desc:
Derivative f'(x): The slope of the tangent at a point. Captures instantaneous rate of change via limits.

Definite Integral ∫ f(x)dx: The area between the graph and the X-axis. Represents the total accumulation of infinitesimal changes.

apps.title: 04. APPLICATIONS
apps.physics_body: Motion prediction. From falling apples to orbital mechanics, all motion is described by differential equations. God wrote the world in calculus.
apps.ml_body: Gradient Descent. AI learns by 'sliding down' (differentiating) the slope of error to find the smartest state (local minimum).
apps.econ_body: Marginal Analysis. Calculating 'what happens if we produce one more unit?' to identify the profit maximization point (slope=0).

completion.msg: Flux Engine parameters optimized. The flow of time is now under your control.

1.name: BASICS
1.log_guide: Initialize system. Set Vector A magnitude > 5.0.

2.name: THEORY
2.log_guide: Orthogonality check. Make Vector A and B perpendicular (Dot Product ≈ 0).

3.name: VISUALIZATION
3.log_guide: Alignment check. Make Vector A and B parallel (Angle ≈ 0°).

concepts.title: 01. CONCEPT: THE ARROW OF REALITY
concepts.def_body: A vector is not just a number; it's an instruction. Go this far, in this direction. It describes movement, force, and flow.
concepts.comp_body: We break vectors down into X, Y, and Z steps. A diagonal flight path is just a combination of forward, right, and up movements.

theory.title: 02. THEORY: SPATIAL LOGIC
theory.dot_desc: A · B = |A||B|cos(θ). Measures alignment. If 0, they are perpendicular (Orthogonal). Used for lighting calculations and checking 'facing' direction.
theory.cross_desc: A × B. Creates a new vector perpendicular to both. Essential for finding rotation axes, torque, and surface normals.

apps.title: 04. APPLICATIONS: 3D SPACE
apps.cg_body: Every 3D game uses vectors for everything. Lighting (dot product with normals), camera direction, and movement.
apps.phys_body: Gravity, wind, and thrust are all vectors. We sum them up (Net Force) to determine where an object will go.
apps.nav_body: GPS and flight paths. 'Heading' and 'Speed' combine to form the velocity vector.

completion.msg: The Void Scout is ready for deep space. You command the dimensions.

2.name: THEORY
2.log_guide: Understand y = A sin(B(x - C)) + D.

3.name: VISUALIZATION
3.log_guide: Match the target waveform. Tune Amplitude, Frequency, and Phase.

concepts.title: 01. CONCEPTS: Circles & Waves
concepts.circle_body: Trigonometry isn't just about triangles; it's about cycles. As you move around a circle, your height creates a Sine wave.
concepts.periodic_body: Nature loves loops. Days, seasons, heartbeats, and sound waves all repeat. Trig functions are the math of repetition.

theory.title: 02. THEORY: Wave Mechanics
theory.eq_desc: This one formula describes almost every vibration in the universe.
theory.params_list_2: B (Frequency): Pitch / Speed / How fast it cycles.
theory.params_list_3: C (Phase Shift): Timing / Offset / When it starts.

viz.title: 03. PROTOCOL: HARMONIC TUNER
viz.log_guide: MATCH THE TARGET WAVEFORM. TUNE AMPLITUDE, FREQUENCY, AND PHASE.

apps.title: 04. APPLICATIONS: Signals
apps.audio_body: Music is just math we can hear. Synthesizers add sine waves together to create instruments.
apps.ac_body: The power in your wall socket oscillates 50/60 times a second (Hz). It's a sine wave of voltage.
apps.fourier_body: The algorithm that runs the world (JPG, MP3, WiFi). It proves that *any* signal can be broken down into simple sine waves.

completion.msg: You have attuned to the rhythm of the cosmos. The signal is clear.

2.name: Sector 2: Distortion
2.hint: Amplitude is doubling, with a slight offset.

concepts.title: 01. CONCEPT: The Flow of Time
concepts.arith_body: Adding the same amount every step. Like walking up stairs. 1, 2, 3, 4... Steady, predictable progress.
concepts.geo_body: Multiplying by the same factor. Like cell division or viral spread. 1, 2, 4, 8... Explosive growth or rapid decay.

theory.title: 02. THEORY: Prediction Algorithms
theory.arith_desc: To find the n-th term, we start at 'a' and add the difference 'd', (n-1) times.
theory.geo_desc: To find the n-th term, we start at 'a' and multiply by the ratio 'r', (n-1) times.

viz.title: 03. PROTOCOL: CHRONOS PATTERN
viz.log_guide: ESTABLISH STASIS. TARGET LINEAR VELOCITY (d) = 0 AND DIVERGENCE (r) = 1.0.

apps.title: 04. APPLICATIONS: Future Casting
apps.finance_body: Money grows geometrically. A small interest rate, given enough time (n), creates massive wealth.
apps.bio_body: Populations multiply. One bacteria becomes two, then four. Understanding 'r' helps us predict pandemics.
apps.algo_body: Binary Search cuts the problem size in half each step (r=0.5). It's a geometric decay of complexity.

completion.msg: You have mastered the patterns of time. The future is now calculable.
